description: testing: update package docs to use ResetTimer() instead of StopTimer/StartTimer()

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6591051/diff/2001/src/pkg/testing/testing.go
File src/pkg/testing/testing.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6591051/diff/2001/src/pkg/testing/testing.go#newcode34
src/pkg/testing/testing.go:34: // may be reseted:
s/reseted/reset/

'reseted' is not a word. the past participle is just 'reset'. yay english.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=64cac28c3af5 ***
